issue.title: [Python] Try to cast or normalize schemas when writing a table to ParquetWriter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3875](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3875). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If we can cast safely to the file schema, it would improve usability to do so automatically. This auto-normalize behavior could be toggled on/off if so desired
